appendix.title: Mutex
appendix.para: MutexMutex.new Creates and returns a new Mutex.
MutexMutex#lock Tries to place a lock on this mutex. If already locked by another thread, blocks until the lock has been removed; if locked by the current thread, raises a ThreadError.
true or falseMutex#locked? Returns true if this mutex is locked; otherwise, false.
IntegerMutex#sleepduration=nil Unlocks this mutex, sleeps for duration seconds, re-locks this mutex, then returns the number of seconds slept. If duration is nil, sleeps forever.
ObjectMutex#synchronize{ } Locks this mutex, yields to the block, releases the lock, then returns the value of the block.
true or falseMutex#try_lock Tries to place a lock on this mutex without blocking: if it is unlocked, locks it, then returns true; otherwise, returns false.
